info.title: InterAction
info.description: LexisNexis InterAction+ is a comprehensive CRM (Customer Relationship Management) solution designed specifically for law firms. Leverage this connector to integrate third party applications with InterAction+ to automate your work, streamline tasks and strengthen client relationships.

post.description: Get List by Id in InterAction+.

query.title: query
query.default: query list($id: ID!, $skip: Int, $limit: Int, $primarySponsorName: String) {     list(id: $id) {         id         name         description         listType {             id             isActive             listClass             name         }         allowedLinkInto         allowedRemoveFrom         addAllowed         deleteAllowed         addActivityAllowed         addNoteAllowed         ownerName         creatorName         allowedContactEntity         isAdministrator         contacts(             skip: $skip             limit: $limit,             filter: { primarySponsorUserName: $primarySponsorName, checkForStrictPrimarySponsor: true },             sort: { direction: "Ascending", field: "displayName" }         ) {             totalModels             models {                 id                 title                 phoneNumber                 emailAddress                 displayName                 companyName                 companyId                 contactEntity                 sponsors {                     displayName                     fullName                     id                     isPrimary                 }                 additionalFieldValues {                     totalModels                     models {                         contactId                         dataType                         fieldDisplayName                         fieldId                         format                         id                         listId                         valueItems {                             lastEditDate                             value                             valueId                         }                     }                 }             }         }     } }

skip.description: Starting point for retrieval of contacts. Default value is set to 0.
skip.title: Skip Contacts

limit.description: Number of contacts to retrieve from lists. Default value is set to 100.
limit.title: Limit Contacts

primarySponsorName.description: Filter list contacts with Primary Sponsor Name which exactly match with display name of the contact.
primarySponsorName.title: Primary Sponsor Name

post.description: Get List by Name in InterAction+.

query.title: query
query.default: query MyQuery($filterByName: String, $skip: Int, $limit: Int) {       lists(filter: { field: name, value: $filterByName }) {           totalModels           models {               id               name               description               listType {                   id                   isActive                   listClass                   name               }               allowedLinkInto               allowedRemoveFrom               addAllowed               deleteAllowed               addActivityAllowed               addNoteAllowed               ownerName               creatorName               allowedContactEntity               isAdministrator               contacts(skip: $skip, limit: $limit,sort: {direction: "Ascending", field: "displayName"}) {                   totalModels                   models {                       id                       title                       phoneNumber                       emailAddress                       displayName                       companyName                       companyId                       contactEntity                       sponsors {                           displayName                           fullName                           id                           isPrimary                       }                   }               }           }       }   }

filterByName.description: List Name (Retrieves the list that exactly matches the specified name).
filterByName.title: List Name

skip.description: Starting point for retrieval of contacts. Default value is set to 0.
skip.title: Skip Contacts

limit.description: Number of contacts to retrieve from lists. Default value is set to 100.
limit.title: Limit Contacts

post.summary: Get Additional Field Definitions and Values
post.description: Get Additional Field Definitions and Values of list from InterAction+.

query.title: query
query.default: query listContactAdditionalFieldsViewDefinitionsAndValues(     $id: ID!     $skip: Int     $limit: Int ) {     list(id: $id) {         id         name         description         listType {             id             isActive             listClass             name         }         additionalFieldDefinitions {             totalModels             models {                 userDataTypeUserProfessional                 userDataTypeUserActive                 stringDataTypeMultiLine                 stringDataTypeMaxLength                 secondaryFieldName                 numericDataTypeMinValue                 numericDataTypeMaxValue                 name                 listDataType {                     options {                         id                         name                     }                 }                 id                 fieldDataType                 description                 decimalDataTypePrecision                 dataTypeDisplayName                 booleanDataTypeFalseValue                 booleanDataTypeTrueValue                 allowsSecondaryField                 allowsMultipleValues             }         }         contacts(             skip: $skip             limit: $limit             sort: { direction: "Ascending", field: "displayName" }         ) {             totalModels             models {                 id                 title                 phoneNumber                 emailAddress                 displayName                 companyName                 companyId                 contactEntity                 sponsors {                     displayName                     fullName                     id                     isPrimary                 }                 additionalFieldValues {                     totalModels                     models {                         contactId                         dataType                         fieldDisplayName                         fieldId                         format                         id                         listId                         separator                         valueItems {                             lastEditDate                             qualification                             value                             valueId                         }                     }                 }             }         }     } }

skip.description: Starting point for retrieval of contacts. Default value is set to 0.
skip.title: Skip Contacts

limit.description: Number of contacts to retrieve from lists. Default value is set to 100.
limit.title: Limit Contacts

query.title: query
query.default: mutation updateAdditionalFields($input: UpdateListContactAdditionalFieldInput!) {   updateListContactAdditionalFields(input: $input) {     models {       failureReason       fieldId       isSuccessful       valueId       __typename     }     __typename   } }

valueId.description: Value Id is required only to update existing value. In case of new value leave this field empty.
valueId.title: Value Id

lastEditDate.description: Last edited date is required only to update existing value. In case of new value leave this field empty.
lastEditDate.title: Last Edit Date

fieldDataType.description: Data type of additional field. Allowed datatypes are integer, text, boolean, decimal, user, date and list.
fieldDataType.title: Field Data Type

post.summary: Add or Update Additional Field Values for Contact
post.description: Add or Update Additional Field Values for Contact in InterAction+.
Get Contact by Id along with Additional Field Values in InterAction+.

query.title: query
query.default: query contact($contactid: ID!, $listid: ID!) {   contact(id: $contactid) {     contactId: id     displayName     contactEntity     ... on Person {       contactId: id       displayName       title       firstName       middleName       lastName       goesBy       currentJobTitle       currentEmployer {         companyName: name         companyId: id       }       additionalFieldValues(listId: $listid) {         totalModels         models {           contactId           dataType           fieldId           fieldDisplayName           additionalFieldValueId: id           listId           valueItems {             lastEditDate             value             valueId           }         }       }       addresses {         addressID: id         street         city         administrativeDivision         country         postalCode       type       usage}     }     ... on Company {       contactId: id       name       additionalFieldValues(listId: $listid) {         totalModels         models {           contactId           dataType           fieldId           fieldDisplayName           id           listId           valueItems {             lastEditDate             value             valueId           }         }       }     }     visibility     emailAddresses {       emailId: id       type       usage       address       label       owningContactId       isGlobal     }     phoneNumbers {       phoneId: id       number       label       type       usage       owningContactId       isGlobal     }     activities {       totalModels       models {         ...ActivityFragment       }     }     notes {       allNotes {         ...NoteResultsFragment       }     }     lists(sort: {field: "name", direction: "Ascending"}, listIds: [$listid]) {       totalModels       models {         listId: id         name         listClass         description         type         userIsSponsor         allowedLinkInto         allowedRemoveFrom         ownerName         creatorName         sponsors {           sponsorId: id           displayName           isPrimary           fullName         }       }     }   } }  fragment ActivityFragment on Activity {   activityId: id   type   typeId   activityClass   typeGroup   activityStartDate   lastEditedDate   subject   summary   location }  fragment NoteResultsFragment on NoteResults {   totalModels   models {     changeDate     folderId     noteId     notes   } }

listid.description: List Id can't be null and default value is set to 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000.
listid.title: List Id

query.title: query
query.default: mutation addPerson($input: AddPersonInput!) {   addPerson(input: $input) {     status     item {       id       firstName       lastName       goesBy       currentJobTitle       phoneNumbers {         id         number         label         type         usage       }       emailAddresses {         id         type         usage         address         label       }       middleName       title       currentEmployer {         name       }       addresses {         city         country         administrativeDivision         street         postalCode       }     }     validationErrors {       propertyName       message     }   } }

country.description: The Country of the business address.
country.title: Country
enum: Papua New Guinea, Independent State of
Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
South Georgia and South Sandwich Islands

street.description: The Street of the business address.
street.title: Street

city.description: The City of the business address.
city.title: City

postalCode.description: The Postal Code of the business address if your country does not use postal code, leave it blank.
postalCode.title: Postal Code

post.description: Get Lists from InterAction+ which includes workingList, marketingList and marketingListWithSponsorship.
Add one or more contacts to one or more lists in InterAction+. For more than one contacts or lists switch the input mode.

query.title: query
query.default: mutation addContactsToLists(   $listIds: [ID!]!,   $contactIds: [ID!]! ) {   addContactsToLists(     listIds: $listIds,     contactIds: $contactIds   ) {     totalCount     successCount     resultText   } }

items.description: Contact Id to add to list.
items.title: Contact Ids

contactIds.description: Contact Id to add to list
contactIds.title: Contact Ids

post.description: Remove Contacts from List in InterAction+.

query.title: query
query.default: mutation MyMutation ($contactIds : [ID!]!, $listId: ID!){   removeContactsFromList(contactIds: $contactIds, listId: $listId) {     resultText pendingContactsEffected     contactsEffected  } }

items.description: Contact Id to remove from a list.
items.title: Contact Ids

contactIds.description: Contact Id to remove from a list.
contactIds.title: Contact Ids

listId.description: List Id to remove contacts from.
listId.title: List Id

post.description: Update a person contact in InterAction+.

query.title: query
query.default: mutation updatePublicPerson($input: UpdatePublicPersonInput!) {   updatePublicPerson(input: $input) {     item {       id      }     status     validationErrors {       propertyName       message           }   } }

country.description: To update Country, City field is also required.
country.title: Country
enum: Papua New Guinea, Independent State of
Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
South Georgia and South Sandwich Islands

postalCode.description: The Postal Code of the business address if your country does not use postal code, leave it blank.
postalCode.title: Postal Code

activityDate.description: The date of the activity in string format. It accepts datetime format in YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss.
activityDate.title: Activity Date

items.title: Linked Entity Ids
items.description: Contact Id representing the entities linked to the activity. It accepts GUID format 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000.

linkedEntityIds.description: Contact Id representing the entities linked to the activity. It accepts GUID format 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000.
linkedEntityIds.title: Linked Entity Ids

post.description: Search person contact based on first name, last name and email address.

query.title: query
query.default: query MyQuery($filterField: ContactFilterField, $filterValue: String) {   searchFirmContacts(filter: {field: $filterField, value: $filterValue}) {     totalModels     models {       contactId: id       displayName       contactEntity       ... on Person {         contactId: id         displayName         title         firstName         middleName         lastName         currentJobTitle         currentEmployer {           companyName: name           companyId: id         }         addresses {           addressID: id           street           city           administrativeDivision           country           postalCode           type           usage         }       }       ... on Company {         contactId: id         name       }       visibility       emailAddresses {         emailId: id         type         usage         address         label         owningContactId         isGlobal       }       phoneNumbers {         phoneId: id         number         label         type         usage         owningContactId         isGlobal       }       activities {         totalModels         models {           activityId: id           type           typeId           activityClass           typeGroup           activityStartDate           lastEditedDate           subject           summary           location         }       }       notes {         allNotes {           totalModels           models {             changeDate             folderId             noteId             notes           }         }       }       lists(sort: {field: "name", direction: "Ascending"}) {         totalModels         models {           listId: id           name           listClass           description           type           userIsSponsor           allowedLinkInto           allowedRemoveFrom           ownerName           creatorName           sponsors {             sponsorId: id             displayName             isPrimary             fullName           }         }       }     }   } }

emailAddress.description: Search person contacts with email address.
emailAddress.title: Search by Email Address

firstName.description: Search person contacts with first name.
firstName.title: Search by First Name

lastName.description: Search person contacts with last name
lastName.title: Search by Last Name

post.description: Edit or Update the Activity field value for Contact in Interaction+.

query.default: mutation updateActivity($input: UpdateActivityInput!) {   updateActivity(input: $input) {     validationErrors {       propertyName       message     }     item {       id       type       typeId       activityClass       typeGroup       activityStartDate       lastEditedDate       subject       summary       location         regarding         }   } }

activityId.description: Activity Id, it accepts GUID format type 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000.
activityId.title: Activity Id

activityDate.description: The date of the activity in string format. It accepts datetime format in YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss.
activityDate.title: Activity Date

items.title: Linked Entity Ids
items.description: Contact Id representing the entities linked to the activity. It accepts GUID format 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000.

linkedEntityIds.description: Contact Id representing the entities linked to the activity. It accepts GUID format 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000.
linkedEntityIds.title: Linked Entity Ids

query.title: query
query.default: query Lists($listClass: [ListClass], $skip: Int, $limit: Int, $filterByName: String) {   lists(listClass: $listClass, skip: $skip, limit: $limit,  filter: {field: name, value: $filterByName}) {     skip     limit     totalModels     models {       id       name       description       listType {         id         isActive         listClass         name       }       allowedLinkInto       allowedRemoveFrom       addAllowed       deleteAllowed       addActivityAllowed       addNoteAllowed       ownerName       creatorName       allowedContactEntity       isAdministrator     }   } }

skip.description: Starting point for retrieval of lists. Default value is set to 0.
skip.title: Skip Lists

limit.description: Number of lists to retrieve. Default value is set to 100.
limit.title: Limit Lists

filterByName.description: List Name (Retrieves lists that contains the specified name).
filterByName.title: List Name
